scripts.say: We somehow made it out unscathed...
Look, the weather's back to normal! We can finally breathe easy...
Thank God you were with us, Enterprise! If you weren't, we'd never have left that place alive...
Where the heck did those Sirens even come from?
No clue... Maybe the ones we spotted way earlier just disappeared and then reappeared in there...
Cleve, I'm getting a transmission! Let's hear what it... Oh my God...
... It's... an unencoded message... from NY City...! Enterprise... there has been an attack...
